alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 4:35PM AKST until December 10 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. East winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Cordova. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty easterly winds will intensify this afternoon and evening. Snow will initially be fairly dry and will blow around easily. Temperatures will rise to around or a bit above freezing this evening, which should diminish the threat from blowing snow. Snow will mix with or change to rain overnight tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
